formatted_address: Lot G-06, Ground Floor, Citrine Hub, 81550 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Sushi House Citrine Hub Sunway Iskandar

reviews.text:
Wanted to have some sushi for dinner while at Sunway Big Box area and chanced upon this place while searching on Google Map. Cosy place with good selection of sushi. Sashimi was fresh with thick cuts.

Price was reasonable.
Excellent japanese food. Impressed with the quality and level of service by the staffs. Will definitely be back here when im around the area.

Daddy and I came here first time. The sushi house is very nice food. I like the chawanmushi is my favourite chawanmushi very much must try this chawanmushi very nice. I think will come back here again soon I can not find the best japanese food here in jb. Thank for the chefs to cook for us dinner I will vote 109.üòÄü•∞ü§©üòãüßë‚Äçüç≥üßë‚Äçüç≥üßë‚Äçüç≥üßë‚Äçüç≥üßë‚Äçüç≥ .see you soon again.

First time here and definitely not the last. When the sushi was served everyone was very amazed with the presentation. Food was awesomely delicious. Salmon sushi and the other sushi served tasted fresh.   Service staff is very attentive.

I also ordered their sashimi 3 type set. Reason u don‚Äôt see in the photos is becos it is so delicious I chewed thru everything too quickly. üòÇ

Their Agedashi Tofu is v good as well.

Will definitely come back again the next time I want good Jap sushi and food. Making this my go to for jap food alr.

And the staff is very attentive, he makes effort to make the dining experience a great one.

vicinity: Lot G-06, Ground Floor, Citrine Hub, Iskandar Puteri
